solution_line_template: Eunice can plant a total of {pots_for_full_planting} pots x {seeds_per_pot} seeds = <<{pots_for_full_planting}*{seeds_per_pot}={seeds_in_three_pots}>>{seeds_in_three_pots} seeds in three pots.
So, only {total_seeds} - {seeds_in_three_pots} = <<{total_seeds}-{seeds_in_three_pots}={seeds_in_fourth_pot}>>{seeds_in_fourth_pot} eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.
